title: The War On Christians Is Coming To Your Door, Christian Or Not (Ep 1787)
description:
In this episode, I address the REAL reason the left has shifted to a war on Christians. It’s related to Trump, January 6, abortion, and identity politics.

News Picks:


Jobless claims hit highest level in months, far outpacing estimates


The Tablet Mag piece discussed in the show today. 


Yes, Biden is responsible for inflation.


NIH Erased Webpage Details Monkeypox Vaccine 'Bioterror' Research Praised By Anthony Fauci.
